name: Roy Tang
text: Perceptions matter since they influence culture. As I've often stated, one of my main concerns is that many in the public at large seem to see these killings as right and/or justified, not just silently accepting but in many cases even openly cheering them on. The longer that both these cardboard killings and the large number of fatalities from police operations continue, the more the public will come to accept these as normal, which is not a situation I want to be in
